The Shire Chamber of Commerce

The Shire Chamber of Commerce Target Audience Color Scheme Typography

Purpose

The purpose of The Shire Chamber of Commerce is to help further strengthen the business of the local community. It is also to grow comradery within The Shire, and help motivate business and customers to be honest in their dealings. It also gives an opportunity to give backlinks to growing business websites to help grow their following and improve their SEO. As a society The Shire Chamber of Commerce can all use it’s dues to advertise The Shire’s local businesses throughout Middle Earth.

Domaine Name Research

After some market research, The Chamber of Commerce has decided upon theshirechamberofcommerce.com as the domain name. The name is available, and we feel .org is a better representation of our business than .com Furthermore, with the changes in recent years to allow .org to be available to businesses, we feel The Shire Chamber of Commerce works nicely as .org.
